name: Wait For Me (NathanielAnderson)
description:
Road Trip Wonder  
Your family road trip is upon you, and after a while, your imagination kicks into gear as you stare out the window. The runalong sprints to keep up, jumping, gliding, diving, and sliding in a frantic attempt to keep up. Lose focus and the runalong will lose the car.

Progressive Gameplay With A Sprinkle Of Competition
Players begin a level in a safe position, then obstacles progress toward them. As they make their way through the level, the game progressively ramps up the speed, making for challenging progression. The game tracks your session and career miles traveled, which unlocks new content when spent at level select. There is even a global leaderboard for each level, showing only the top ten scores. Jump in and earn your bragging rights!
